description: Your Juggernaut Skills deal [55 - 75]%%[x] increased damage to Bosses and Crowd Controlled enemies.

name: Aspect of Ascension

description: Consuming Resolve stacks with Juggernaut Oath grants an additional [60 - 100]%%[x] damage.

description: When there are at least 5 Close enemies, Stun them for [2.5 - 4.5] seconds. Can only occur once every 20 seconds.

description: Increase the damage and size of Judgement's explosion by [40 - 60]%%[x].

description: Judicator Skills have a 40%% chance to chain to a Close enemy for [50 - 150]%%[x] of their damage. If no enemy is within range, damage the initial target instead.

description: You no longer dodge, but your Block chance is increased by [10 - 30]%%[+].

description: Judgement detonations can detonate other Judgements early. Judgement deals [60 - 100]%%[x] increased damage.

description: Losing Resolve grants you [76 - 140] Thorns for 10 seconds. Stacks up to 20 times.

description: Thorns damage heals you for [0.20 - 0.40]%% of your Maximum Life.

description: Each stack of Fervor grants you [10.0 - 20.0]%% bonus Healing Received from all sources.

name: Aspect of Elemental Fate
description: Gain [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage to a set of damage types for 7 seconds alternating randomly between 2 sets: Fire, Lightning, Holy, and Physical. Cold, Poison, and Shadow.Fate can favor you granting the same bonus more than once, stacking up to 6 times. At Maximum, it's your lucky day!

description: You gain [0.4 - 0.8]%%[+] increased Armor for 4 seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to [25.0 - 46.0]%%[+].

name: (DNS) Conqueror's Aspect
description: Juggernaut Skills grant you Conqueror for 4 seconds when hitting a Crowd Controlled enemy. Juggernaut Skills always Overpower during Conqueror. This effect has a [40 - 20] second Cooldown.
